id: W - next start of whitespace-delimited wo
A - append at the end of the line
y{motion} - yank text that {motion} moves over

command_preview: :s/foo/bar/ - replace the first match of 'foo' with 'bar' on the current line only

id: :split filename - split window and load another file
C-u 5 C-x 2 - Split screen vertically with 5 row height
M-x goto-line - Goto a line number
Ctrl+C - Show current line number and file information
Ctrl+A - Move to beginning of line
Ctrl+E - Move to end of line

command_preview: Ctrl+X - Exit nano. You will be prompted to save your file if you haven't
Ctrl+K - Cut a line into the clipboard. You can press this repeatedly to cut multiple lines

id: Ctrl+p - Move to the previous l
Ctrl+x - Exit Pico, saving the file

command_preview: Ctrl+d - Delete the character at the cursor position

id: Ctrl+^ - Begin selecting text at the cursor.*
